About.AboutText: Maharah aims to provide the labor market with cadres and workers in various professions to meet the market demand by emphasizing on training and developing its team to provide better services to its clients.
About.VisionText: Leading the human resources sector by providing comprehensive and integrated solutions that ensure our clients success, protect employees' rights and support the national development
About.MissionText: We are working on providing innovative human resources solutions and services to our customers through institutionalized system, superior IT and strategic partnerships that serve our employees, customers and community.

Ayadi.Title: Choose one of our Programs
Ayadi.AyadiProgramsMessages: This service is provided through Ayadi Higher Training Institute
Ayadi.HousingProgramDescription: The program offers you training and qualification in the culinary arts of the Saudi home, and training on several dishes that we always find in any Saudi home. We care about commitment to cleanliness and consistently delicate presentation.
Ayadi.MasterCookingDescription: The program offers you training and education on making several different and varied dishes of salads that will nourish your body and delight your eyes when making them. You will get training on 10 different types of delicious salads with the finest fresh ingredients.
Ayadi.ElderlyCareProgramDescription: The worker is trained in a specialized manner to care for the elderly, meet their requirements, and know the proper ways to provide food and medicine according to need and necessity.
Ayadi.ChildCareProgramDescription: Developing care skills and interacting with children in a positive and effective manner and learning how to organize appropriate educational and recreational activities for children from newborns up to five years of age.
Ayadi.AdvancedChildCareForSpecialNeedProgramDe: Gain advanced skills in interacting with children with special needs, analyzing their behavior, and learning how to deal with the challenges of caring for them at all different stages of their development.

AyadiServiceForm.InvalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
AyadiServiceForm.SubmitRequest: Thank you. Your request has been registered successfully and we will contact you through Ayadi Institute within 48 hours.

Shifaa.Title: Globe Care Company
Shifaa.AboutShifaa: GLOBCARE is a leading company in the field of home medical care and telemedicine employing a professional team of caregivers, nursing specialists, physiotherapists and nutritionists to provide all home medical services equal to those provided by hospitals.
Shifaa.ServicesDescription: Our qualified caregivers are ready to provide care for the elderly people, children and patients and assist them in performing their daily activities.
Shifaa.HousingCareDutiesTitle: Duties of home health care providers
Shifaa.Duty2: Taking care of oneself physically and hygienically (changing bed linens, bathing, haircuts, etc.)
Shifaa.Duty3: Using a tube or your mouth to feed yourself
Shifaa.Duty5: Accompanying patients to special events and appointments
Shifaa.Duty6: Offering assistance with daily tasks like walking or moving
Shifaa.Duty8: Tracking Kids while they are Sleeping
Shifaa.Duty10: Registration and documentation in the electronic system that can be accessed by parents through GLOBCARE
Shifaa.ShifaaService: This service is provided by Globe Care Company

Is the patient chronically ill? 
 If yes, please specify

ShifaaServiceForm.InhaledMedications: Does the patient use oxygen or inhaled medications?
ShifaaServiceForm.Catheter: Does the patient have any type of catheters?
ShifaaServiceForm.HaveWounds: Does the patient have wounds, diabetic feet, or bed sores?
ShifaaServiceForm.SubmitRequest: Thank you. Your request has been successfully registered, and Globe Care will contact you within 24 hours

Discount.DiscountText: This page is for business owners who wish to establish a strategic relationship with Maharah Company, to give its employees special discounts on the services of the individual sector.

Splash.Splash1Content: We periodically provide maids with the highest standards
Splash.Splash2Content: It enables you to manage your workers in the way that suits you and you can raise multiple requests
Splash.Splash3Content: We provide you with trained maids and professional training
Splash.MonthlyServicesDescription: Domestic workers with a monthly system (cleaning, cooking, nanny, driver) from one month to 24 months
Splash.SelfServiceDescription: You can advance or postpone the visit date and also lock or change the cleaner with a click of a button
Splash.VariousPaymentMethodsDescription: ApplePay, Visa, Mastercard, Mada, STCPay, Sadad, Tamara, Emkan
